title: Create stock research agent
content:
stock_searcher = Agent(
    name="Stock Searcher",
    model=OpenAIChat("gpt-5-mini"),
    role="Searches the web for information on a stock.",
    tools=[
        ExaTools(
            include_domains=["cnbc.com", "reuters.com", "bloomberg.com", "wsj.com"],
            text=False,
            show_results=True,
            highlights=False,
        )
    ],
)
